page.title: Credits
page.text: (!bold/CNbox) (!line) (!line) CollegeNollegeYT - Director, composer, lead designer, lead animator and coder (!line) Gontale - Secondary animator (!line) The Ducking Modder - Secondary designer (!line) MishaBring - Bonus animator and storyboard artist (!line) R.K - Third designer (!line) (!line) (!bold/Thanks to Rem for the build!)
